div.p: [...] already and [...] (something) else. If you are neglectful, you will be sure to be in trouble. Greetings, Year [...]. Theodoros to Diotimos, greetings. Please write urgently to Androsthenes and the nomarchs to send the anouchi using all the draught-animals, just as they did before. With the river rising higher up to all the dykes, everything has to be strengthened. (Tell him also) to send the [...]. Translation with slight modifications: B.
